segments.text: I opened my mail , found this eviction notice , and don ’ t know what to do with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it is a 30 - day notice to vacate the premises .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just for being a few days late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This isn ’ t the first time you have been considerably late with the rent . I need to start the procedure to evict you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you taking my apartment away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a notice to inform you that the sheriff will evict you in 30 days if you do not pay up on your rent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I keep the apartment if I pay my rent in full ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can keep the apartment if you stay caught up on your rent . Otherwise , I need to find someone who can make the payments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go write a check right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I will need a cashier ’ s check or cash , please .
segments.speaker: S2
